entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
